Cache Troubleshooting - UPDATED VERSION

If you don't see the latest changes, follow these steps:
🔥 EMERGENCY CACHE CLEARING 🔥
Chrome / Edge / Safari
STEP 1
Press Ctrl + Shift + R
STEP 2
Or press Ctrl + F5
ALT
Right-click refresh button → "Empty Cache and Hard Reload"
Firefox
STEP 1
Press Ctrl + Shift + R
STEP 2
Or press Ctrl + F5
ALT
Open Developer Tools → Right-click refresh → "Empty Cache and Hard Reload"
Mobile Devices
iOS Safari
Settings → Safari → Clear History and Website Data
iOS Chrome
Chrome Menu → History → Clear Browsing Data
Android
Chrome Menu → History → Clear Browsing Data
Android
Or use incognito/private browsing mode
